Pre-Game Insights: England aiming to make it three for three under the wing of Lee Carsley
Carsley's prospects of taking the reins full-time are being pressed
England have won their opening two battles in the Nations League with 2-0 victories
Greece lead the way on a marginally superior goal difference
Greece have demonstrated their League A credentials with comfortable beatings of Finland (3-0) and Ireland (2-0) in their opening two battles
